subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Maryland switched to the Big Ten conference on Monday in search of financial stability, possibly igniting another wave of realignment as Rutgers is expected to follow suit Tuesday.
snippet: Maryland switched to the Big Ten conference on Monday in search of financial stability, possibly igniting another wave of realignment as Rutgers is expected to follow suit Tuesday.
